website_summaries.verdict: The design of this unique wallet isn't for everyone, but for those who prefer a thin build, it has that plus a lot of useful features and a low price.
pros: Stands out for the slim, bifold design that fits easily in most bags
Made of sturdy leather and features RFID blocking technology
Lots of pockets including 20 card slots and a large compartment to fit smaller cell phones
cons: Though thin, it's longer than traditional wallets which some owners find awkward
Durability issues including frayed seams and broken zippers have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, it all fits!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this wallet! It just arrived today, and this is the fourth wallet I've gotten recently, the other 3 went back. This one is totally a keeper. I've had the hardest time finding a wallet that will hold ALL my cards and still close without being huge. So this wallet holds all my cards, my check book, a bunch of receipts, and closes without bulk. Glad I got this one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth David

customer_reviews.title: I like it more than my LV wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Reasons why I love it, there's a lot of room for my plastic cards, it has a soft leather, it has this RFID thing, I can see the top of the cards and pull it out easily but not too loose that it will fall out , love the color, functionality and style is more than 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Mari

customer_reviews.title: I was delighted to received this item
customer_reviews.text: I have been an amazon costumer for more than ten years now, when it comes to writing reviews I seldom do it unless the product that I received has a special quality that I cant help my self not to give review on it. I was delighted to received this item, the quality is superb, workmanship is well crafted. The Yaluxe Women's Leather Multi card can accommodate 20 credit cards, but it will still look flat. I never expect that this wallet turn out to be a very excellent credit card holder. It looks so expensive,the red color is awesome, no enough words I can use to describe this product.
customer_reviews.author: JOCELYN PINERO

customer_reviews.title: This wallet/card holder is exactly what i wanted.
customer_reviews.text: The RFID Blocking (I guess I have to assume it does that), is well made, nice leather and holds about 15 cards. And then I have some of them doubled up so it's more. The slots hold tight enough that they don't fall out but I haven't had much trouble getting them out either. One side with the chain pull I use for coins and the other end holds unfolded bills. It snaps like it should even with it full of cards. I would definitely recommend this wall/card holder.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but very poor quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait for this wallet to arrive, I have use it for only 3 days and it is tearing apart already. Not worth the money by any means & am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap zipper
customer_reviews.text: I initially liked everything about his wallet. It's sleek and thin and holds everything I need with extra space. Unfortunately, the day after I transferred everything into my new wallet (which was 2 days after I received it) the zipper broke! When I went to look at when I could return this product by, it was the day in which I received it. Hopefully this doesn't happen to anyone else, but it seems cheaply made if it couldn't even handle me opening and closing it less than a handful of times! Now I'm stuck looking for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna H.

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable, classy looking, lots of card space!
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet with tons of room. I gave way too many credit cards, gift cards, and other cards at any given time. This wallet fits nicely in my cross-body purse to organize my cards, cash, and checkbook. My only complaint (if you can call it that) is that the button doesn't connect effortlesslessy once it's filled with cards. It seems to lay off-set a bit. A magnetic closure in a different location would be great. Nonetheless, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: call me JC

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it. Leather is more like vinyl and the wallet is easy too long and big. I use it in my safe to store credit cards I don't carry on me because it's definitely not suitable for a purse.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie2012

customer_reviews.title: best wallet ever
customer_reviews.text: This one here is a Christmas present but I have one just like it and think I absolutely love it I will probably never go to another kind of wallet again you open it up and you can see every single one of your cards you have room for your bills plus you have a room for your phone plus they can't scan your cards it's wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie schneider

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet. It holds just as many cards as my thicker wallet but maintains is slimness. The cash slot is a little stiff, but anything more would sacrifice the thinness I was looking for. It is a little awkward to get used to using if you have never had anything that folds open this much before, but it doesnt take long. I have gotten so many complements on this wallet. It is unlike any others I have ever seen and perfect for a smaller thin purse.
customer_reviews.author: CStone

customer_reviews.title: Not very flexible
customer_reviews.text: I do like the wallet, however, it can become tight when each credit card slot is filled. The bill portion is not tight enough to hold dollars so both change & dollar bill's have to go In the zipper side. There is no way I can slide my cell phone in as it is in the ad display. I think another small snap or zipper pocket for change would help. As it is, it's hard to get change out of the zipper slot. Bottom line, I like that my credit cards are protected with RFID. I would not purchase another one like this. May purchase something specifically for credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Insulated in Pgh PA

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet. Space for things I need and not for excess stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of this type wallet. I wanted a wallet that would accommodate a number of credit and other cards, wanted a place to secure money (not folded) and no wasted place for a checkbook. This wallet answered all three issues. The card slots are generous. I have doubled up in some. There are two zippered compartments to hold money full faced. I have cash in one and a couple of checks (for those extremely rare occasions) and my emergency information in the other one. Even though I pack it pretty full, it’s a nice flat silhouette which slides easily into a lot of purses. I have gotten a few compliments on it because it’s unusual.
customer_reviews.author: J. Colmenares

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a target for a mugging when I open this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bc of all the credit card slots. I also carry health insurance cards, club membership cards, etc. What I discovered in using it, is that to retrieve a card, it opens wide and the contents are displayed for anyone nearby to see. That makes me feel like a target, so I’m going back to a regular wallet.
customer_reviews.author: txteacherlady

customer_reviews.title: Unconventional shape but holds a LOT!
customer_reviews.text: I was uncertain about this wallet after it arrived. I had not had a wallet this expansive before. To me it was an odd shape but now that I've had it for quite a while I am acclimated to it & like it a lot. I like that you can see all your cards at a glance (obviously this depends on the number of cards you carry with you.) It has a zipper compartment that I use for address labels (that I use at a shipping store or doctor office when filling out forms.) It's not so big that it doesn't fit in all my purses. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good Wallet -  I Just Really Wish It Held Up Longer
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this wallet, it's spacious and I like to be able to see all my cards and I liked the safety for my credit cards. I bought my husband an RFID wallet and saw this one and the reviews and bought it. The only bad thing is it ripped after about 18 months. I attached the picture. I'm not sure I would use it again for this reason. But I guess it could be a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: KeeneFish

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Now I am so organized and can find whatever I need in an instant. I love this wallet so much. I put my dollars the side without the zipper making them easy to get to, and any receipts given me into the zippered side. Then I bought from Amazon a clear little change purse that makes finding whatever coin I need so easy. The two items take up much less space in my purse than my old wallet did. This is an Aplus for me!
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Eller

customer_reviews.title: NICE WALLET WITH NUBBY-LEATHER FINISH (RED)
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of this style of wallet ... all Yaluxe... but this is the only color that came in a nice-looking nubby leather finish. They came in different boxes too, so I guess there are other vendors selling the same brand.. The other two (blue and purple) are okay, but the leather on those two doesn’t look like leather, although it says they are. I bought a couple as gifts... I’m keeping this red one for me.
customer_reviews.author: KIS

customer_reviews.title: My 2019 Best Purchase!!  LOL!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this wallet!! With ALL of my rewards cards, my debit and credit cards, gift cards, insurance cards, etc.... this is IDEAL!! Keeps all of these cards in order and visible, without the big bulky feel of a wristlet, which is what I WAS carrying. No more holding up the line searching for the right card. Does this only happen to me? LOL ...and it fits in the back pocket of my jeans!!!! It’s a bit long, and dies stick out a bit, so I wouldn’t recommend carrying it there, if you’re not wearing a long sweatshirt or jacket!! My prayers have been answered. Found a similar men’s wallet for my husband, as he was coveting mine!
customer_reviews.author: Cherylynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wallet for me!
customer_reviews.text: This wall is beautifully made and a pleasure to use. It holds all the credit cards, med cards, etc. I need with a few empty slots. I especially like that it has only one zipper which I keep cash and coupons in. The other side is for receipts, lists, etc. i snaps quickly pushing it together with no extra fussy strap to hold it together. When I researched the size, it was one of the smallest and thinest of other similar wallets. This was important as I now carry a fannie pack because it is just easier with Co-Vid issues. However, it will also be perfect if/when I use a larger purse. I love the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: mt.ash

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is a fully functional and slimming wallet to use as an alternative to the typical big, bulky wallet. This is helpful because will fit in any size purse you choose to carry - from day to night; any size from totes and backpacks, to hobos, crossbodies and clutches. Zipper pockets are able to fit bills, and change, and even an iphone (without big, bulky case). I’ve been using mine for several years and have gotten a couple as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Micheletti

customer_reviews.title: #LOVE THESE WALLETS!! Real leather
customer_reviews.text: #LOVE LOVE LOVE! Great value, real leather, very light, great colors, & great wallet organizer!! I purchased the red for myself & purple for my mother as a birthday gift! She loved it!! Love the deep blood red color as it looks very expensive & easy to see in my large “purse”!! Lots of slots for credit cards! Zipper compartment for change or bills. Separate compartment for just bills. Was so excited to see such a great affordable price on Amazon for these wallets!! The texture of the leather is very smooth & soft. Exactly what I’d been looking for & needed!! I recommend these wallets!
customer_reviews.author: northa w sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Believe the 5 star reviews
customer_reviews.text: Bought the brown YALUXE Women's RFID Blocking Genuine Leather Multi Card Organizer Wallet with Zipper Pocket and love it. I keep all my important items in this wallet so when I decide to change purses my important items go into the purse I want to take that day. Love that I have plenty of room to hold all my cards plus I have a few slots free! It is thin so it doesn't take up that much room. I have had 2 people comment on this wallet and ask where I got it. One person bought 3 extra wallets to give as Christmas presents which I thought was a great idea. You cannot go wrong with this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great color selection and easy to use...if your purse has an internal strap to attach your key to easily pull you keys out, the zipper has a small brass circle that you can attach the wallet to also. This was a big benefit for me. Recently my wallet unknowly fell out of my purse and I lost all of my identification and a few credit cards. What a mess and luckily the loss was minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Imhapy

customer_reviews.title: It makes having cash and cards easier without that annoying bulge from folded bills
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item due to the partiality of the design. It's simple, slim, organized and a lovely color to match my black bag. It makes having cash and cards easier without that annoying bulge from folded bills. There are plenty of card slots to keep all the insurance cards, credit cards, gift cards, ID's etc. The slim design almost makes it great for space saving in my bag, or just grabbing it for a pick run into the store.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wallet! One of my friends pulled one just like it out of her purse after lunch, and I fell in love with it. Had to get me one, too! It has enough room for ALL of my cards, etc., AND it's RFD protected as well. It folds up smartly, and is "flatter" than any of my other wallets, so it fits quite nicely in my purse. Additionally, it seems like every time I've pulled it out to pay for something (at the grocery store, drug store, Starbucks), the cashiers compliment it, too. I'm VERY happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Arena Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in color description
customer_reviews.text: I am in possession of another wallet of this same design and have loved it, Eventually the card pockets loosened up on that one (by another company) and I have been afraid of loosing cards from it. I ordered this one because of the design and the design is good. My problem is that I ordered the dark pink. However, the dark pink is really a light red and I do not like red and would never have ordered that color. I received this yesterday and I may decide to return it for a better color.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Will be ordering another!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this wallet. Now that i have my son and need to carry all these extra cards for medical or stores for him i needed way more slots and something that would fit my purse and my samsung note 9. This thing does it all, holds change and looks cute. Durable as it switches from purse to diaper bag, my hands or my 8months olds hands. This thing is perfect for moms!! My mother saw it and ordered one in coral and now i want one in coral. I got the sage green one and its soooooo friggen cute!! Will recommend to others and purchase another!!
customer_reviews.author: pedikeensTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Colors that are shown will not match the color you choose
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of this product, the functionality was better than I ever expected. It holds almost everything in a compact shape. The color I ordered was the the choice I was given was purple but what I received was not purple like the picture I was shown. It was more of a mulberry color. If I wasn’t purple crazy I would be ok with it. I’d be sending it back. But because I like the way it can be used I’m keeping it. Beware the colors they show may not be the color you get!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Kuban

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet/card holder ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th one I have purchased! Every time I take it out, one of my family members comments on it and wants one, so I have bought 5 for gifts as friends and relatives'!! Everyone loves it. Fits nicely in almost any purse, holds everything neat and accessible. I just love it and it is made of a good quality material and the zipper is very tight and no change can fall out!! Love it. I will buy 5 more as gifts for my daughters bridesmaids for her wedding!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have been needing a new wallet forever now. I am picky about the type I have and I really did not want to spend a lot of money on a wallet. This wallet is working out for me really well. There is so much space for cards and money. I love how big it is and yet it is so thin. I got the light blue one, and the color is vibrant. The packaging was also great! It was wrapped nicely and in a gift box. I totally recommend this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: danigrly

customer_reviews.title: THE  GREATEST  WALLET....EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!!! Large flat wallet. Gorgeous material. True to color. And I can zip my iPhone in a otter box case inside the zipper part and wallet doesn't look bulky.
customer_reviews.author: o

customer_reviews.title: Extremely functional
customer_reviews.text: There are so many slots that I can put all my credit cards, rewards cards, insurance cards--everything--into it and there is a separate place for bills and a zippered section for coins or anything else you want to make sure you don't lose. When I change purses this is the only article that I have to remember to switch to the other purse. AND on top of all that, this is an RFID item, meaning it protects your credit cards from being hacked.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think I would like it, but I do
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I bought this, I didn't think I was going to like it, but I do. It's nice to flop it open and have all your cards visible at the same time. I get a lot of compliments on it. It doesn't handle loose change well though.
customer_reviews.author: melissa butler

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots of cards
customer_reviews.text: I got this wallet because I needed room for more credit cards. The number of slots for cards is a huge plus, but I was a little disappointed with the zipper compartment. It's great for coins, but I've had a few dollars rip from the zipper because the compartment isn't large enough to hold bills.
customer_reviews.author: MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect wallet. Love the color. I was afraid it would be too long but it's just perfect. I don't even have to take the wallet out of my purse to take out cash. My cards and ID's fit perfectly with room to space. In some of the reviews they stated the cards were in too tight to take out. I didn't find that to be a problem. I'm sure that with use, it will be easier but frankly, I don't want my cards slipping out because they weren't in the tight enough. RFID blocking was a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald Hope

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is, hands down, the best wallet I have ever had. It's so sleek, yet holds so much! Love all the room for ALL my cards....credit cards, gift cards, membership cards, etc. Love the security of the zipper top for cash or change. The leather is really good quality and the purple is a gorgeous color. I get compliments on it all the time. And the fact that it is RFID blocking just makes me love it more.
customer_reviews.author: MBSolberg

customer_reviews.title: good wallet if you want to keep things clean.
customer_reviews.text: this wallet solved all my problems, i have so many cards, personal and business CC's. my wallet stays organized and its slim, fits into all my small purses and live traveling with this. the sewing quality is very good, I have been using it for months now and it still looks very new, no loose threads or things coming unglued, GOOD QUALITY for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME WALLET
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd wallet, I have one in purple. I love the fact is has so many slots so you can see all your cards. I have been complimented at least a dozen times when I go purchase something. It has an opening for cash and a zipper section for change. And it's not too bulky. I had the other one for at least 3 years and it's still in very good shape. Bought this one so it matched my new purse.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Brokenshire

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it has a lot of card slots, and it has that stolen card number protection. Love it, holds every thing I need. Would of been better with 2 zipper pockets, the one with no zipper everything falls out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris cadwallader

customer_reviews.title: True to description and works well
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is true to the purple color. It is as functional and useful as the descriptions and pictures illustrate. The things I dislike are that this is actually really awkward and long when it’s open and it’s kind of difficult to pull the cards out, especially towards the center of the wallet. Also, I wish more of the card was visible for grip and seeing which card it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kal Parso

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 5 star security wallet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the money very well made enough compartments for all your credit cards medical cards and a nicely lined zipper compartment the length of the security wallet when it’s closed the zipper is also a well made zipper all brass that opens and closes smoothly all closes with a nicely brass snap closure. I’m a very picky shopper and this is a fantastic buy. You will be very pleased and know that your identity is safe also. Fine leather also, I got the light green very pretty. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bosso

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my cards, credit, insurance, rewards, etc. It is a bit long and since I carry smaller purses it doesn't fit in some but I love it because I can easily find my cards and it has a buildings and a zippered section.
customer_reviews.author: LambiePie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a wallet that works! Not that I have so many credit cards, but all of the store rewards/shopper cards I have to have for my routine shopping would not fit in other wallets. Not to mention business cards I like to hold onto. This wallet fits a lot of cards nicely, and still has pocket for cash, as well as nice zippered pouch for other items. I’m impressed with the quality and it came very nicely packaged! Would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Collette Klein

customer_reviews.title: Do you have too many gift cards and credit cards? THIS IS AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Very thin but holds so many cards!! I can fit all of my gift cards and credit cards in this wallet; along with ID, debit card and health insurance cards. I wanted something thin that I could fit into my small purse. I hate carrying a large bag when I am out shopping and I was just walking around with cards not in a wallet but just hanging inside of my purse. This fit PERFECTLY. I am so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Rank

customer_reviews.title: Great credit card wallet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet! I have a lot of store credit cards and all of them fit in here along with my ID. The 2 openings on the side are kind of small and tight fitting. I used one side to keep a few dollars in it & the other side I keep a few blank checks in it. It snaps close easily. It's perfect mainly to hold credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: CeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Whats not to love on this slim wallet?
customer_reviews.text: This item turned out just as i hoped it would. it holds ALL my cards visibly and i don't have to double up as i did with the old billfold. Once all the card slots are filled it still snaps together, but probably will not if you stuff more loose stuff in between. The leather is both outside and inside and feels great and the color (green) is lovely, not garish but soft. Less material on this wallet (no lids, or extra zippers) so it is lighter and less bulky. your friends will notice it.
customer_reviews.author: thinkering

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet ever!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I already had written a review for this, but apparently have not. I love this wallet: the color (mint), the heft of it, how many cards and other things it holds. I can't think of one thing I don't love about it. I've gotten numerous compliments on it; I also saw another woman w/ one exactly like mine. This woman echoed my sentiment exactly about the wallets exactly. I would recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet . It’s kind of long but very thin, considering it has two layers of card holders and cash compartments. The snap holds well yet it is easy to flip open. Cards stay put. I got a lower price for choosing purple; it’s a great color. It feels like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon woman

customer_reviews.title: Stays slim!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I’m always switching bags so this is convenient. I absolutely love the color as well. It’s slick and fits nicely in small bags too. My wallet is full of cards and it still remains slim. I’m purchasing a different color soon because I like this wallet a lot. Cons: None!
customer_reviews.author: SmartFire

customer_reviews.title: Slim and compact
customer_reviews.text: After two tries I received my purple wallet. It’s beautiful, just as I wanted. Yaluxe was easy to deal with and went above and beyond to be sure I received my purple wallet and it was what I wanted. It holds my cards and my money. When I upgraded my phone I lost the wallet case I was using, this and an OtterBox case does it all. Takes up little space, fits in most of my pockets, not bulky, really can’t say enough about how much I love this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Tired Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this, I was excited, but as I filled it in and started to use it, I found it was kinda large for me. I don't like pulling it out and having other ppl see all the stuff I have in it as I open it to pull out credit cards. It was also suppose to have security measures to someone can't walk up and capture you credit card info. I have a smaller version of this and when I enter my work and have to show ID, I don't even have to take it out the wallet, I hold the wallet up to the scanner and the gate opens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but way to o big for me. ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok but way to o big for me. Wish they had one half this size. You need a bigger purse to carry this in.. It is made very well and for anyone that has a big purse this is ideal. There is plenty of room for card. Mine is only about 1/3 full and you wouldn't know it. Don't know how bulky it would be if it was full of cards.
customer_reviews.author: sheri

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallet but...
customer_reviews.text: While this product may block credit card information, it certainly doesn't block a person from seeing all of your credit cards once you open it! The quality of the wallet is good; however, the design leaves a person in a vulnerable position when they have to access their credit card.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Analyst

customer_reviews.title: This wallet lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I have this in rfid deep pink. I bought it almost 2 years ago, and it still looks very good. I use almost every slot plus the zipper pocket and the plain pocket. It is my primary wallet. The zipper works. The stitching is secure. The finish is almost like new. It's very useful, fits well in my purse and doesn't take up much space. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Starr Hadley

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT WALLET
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this wallet so much. This review is after 3 years and a month. It's held up, is still in perfect condition, and has no signs of wear and tear. It holds all my cards and is still slim. It has been flawless in performance. I have bought leather wallets for 5x the price and watched them fall apart in a year. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jones Goldbach

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of membership cards and credit cards and I LOVE THIS WALLET!! Its perfect! I even have room left! Its also got a pocket for cash as well! Very well made and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Justin A. or Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Long, But I Like It!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet! It's thin, but still has room for all my cards. I loaded up everything and smiled; then I realized that I didn't want to open my wallet in a store and have all of my cards on display. They weren't all credit cards, but that's what they looked like! 😂 I now only have cards on one side. The wallet is long when you open it up all the way. Something to keep in mind. Great value for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Dutchess

customer_reviews.title: like a women's wallet
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my cards; no need for a separate holder. Looks impressive when I whip this out at checkout; I've gotten more than one surprised look at how many cards this holds. It's large, like a women's wallet. Has a zippered compartment for coins and an open pocket for cash. I store my cash in the zippered compartment for added safety. Made of leather, so will last a long time. Easy to get cards in and out of their slots.
customer_reviews.author: twofortea

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I have carried this wallet for six months and love it because it holds all my cards tightly, none fall out, my bills are straight, not folded, and the change purse is easy to access and secure. I have received many compliments on this and love its flatness to minimize the bulk in my purse. It is well made and durable for extended use
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: I would give this 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a wallet like this for myself awhile back, but they no longer carry it. I wanted to get one for a gift, and this is the most similar product I could find. I liked this one even better! It came wrapped amazingly, even though I didn't mark it as being for a gift on Amazon. The package even smelled good! I was able to give it as a gift on the cute box it came in. Very sturdy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Smokii G

customer_reviews.title: Holds all my cards
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for years for a wallet that would fit all my various insurance cards, credit cards, and membership cards. I have seven cards just for work related access alone! The only wallets I was ever able to find were huge, grandma looking things. This one is amazing! It holds my cards, cash, and has the zipper pocket for change or a phone. And it's much thinner. Plus, I can carry it as a clutch and it still looks cute. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: littlechicken

customer_reviews.title: I wanted thin and this wallet delivered!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is nice and thin - fully loaded it's less than 3/4" thick. I really like that I can access my cash without opening the card part of the wallet so there's little risk of dropping something when I'm just pulling out bills or change. My only negative is that there's no open ID window - if it had that I'd call it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: NJdilettante

customer_reviews.title: just because I don't like the idea of having to open and flash the ...
customer_reviews.text: After getting this I've decided that I'm not going to use it as a wallet, just because I don't like the idea of having to open and flash the contents every time I want to get my debit card out. But it will make a great secondary wallet for all the loyalty, medical, and gift cards that I want to have on hand but don't need ready access to all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Yaluxe RFID wallet...nice and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this wallet for a few days, and I love it! It is a low profile wallet that keeps all of my rewards cards, insurance cards, credit/debit cards, etc organized and easily accessible. It seems to be a good quality product and easy to use. It came in a nice box and liner bag. I recently had my debit card info stolen, and wanted to find a wallet that would protect my information. This wallet is helpful for that as well as looking nice and being practical.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Wow ,I can't believe how useful and sturdy this wallet is!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I can't believe how useful and sturdy this wallet is! I really didn't expect it to be this good.I literally ordered it for all the slots it had.I hope it continues to hold them in tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Lorny

customer_reviews.title: Love it, overall
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much LOVE this wallet! Real leather, it smells good, and I love that it holds all my cards in separate slots so they are easy to find quickly. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that I wish the snap was a magnetic closure instead, it just doesn't stay snapped very well, in my opinion. Like if I reach into dollar bill slot, it comed unsnapped. Other than that, it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Becca B

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is wonderful. Holds everything that I have with room to spare. Now I can actually find anything that I am looking for in my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Roy

customer_reviews.title: ... me and 1 for my mom) and we both LOVE it! It is lightly padded so it's very ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these (1 for me and 1 for my mom) and we both LOVE it! It is lightly padded so it's very soft. There are 10 credit card slots on each side (20 total) so it holds all of my credit card plus all of those pesky retailer rewards card (i.e. CVS, Walgreens, Kroger, etc.) and everything is in one place. The zipper compartment easily holds my iPhone 6S and the open compartment is large enough that cash fits in easily without folding or cramming it in. If you're thinking about ordering it, don't hesitate. You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Great for Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: Love the RFID protection and not having to have each, individual card in a protective sleeve. Everything visible when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Rains

customer_reviews.title: New Go-To Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Holds all of my cards/IDs nicely. It was a lot larger than I expected; I'm not able to fit it into a smaller, "going-out" purse, but it works well for everyday needs in a larger bag. I love the shade of purple and the gold accents add a touch of class :) Only thing I wish the card slots all faced the same way, I have to do a little finagling to get to the side I need. Also it's kind of weird when I am out paying for something it feels like all my business is out there for people to see lol. But other than that I am a happy camper for the price :)
customer_reviews.author: Charisse

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet, good quality, and very thin. It's a little long for my liking, but what made me return it was that I would have to open the wallet (and let one side flap open and hang), to pull a card out to pay for things, which would expose ALL my cards (something I hadn't thought of before I purchased it). If I'm at a cash register paying, I prefer a wallet that's a little more discrete. I don't want people knowing how many cards I have (or which ones). The wallet is okay though, I'm just not a fan of the design
customer_reviews.author: T. Pro

customer_reviews.title: Good 2 and choice
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had looked longer and found the one that has a strap to hold the 2 sides together. I would have bought that first After you put you credit cards, license, etc the snap does not keep it shut. It is good other than that
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Poorman

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality for the money. Looks and feels soft and supple, all the slots are perfect for holding my cards, a place where cash fits and lies flat, and a zippered compartment for change, receipts, etc. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Joan R

customer_reviews.title: New favorite wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet. It keeps all my cards in one place and is much slimmer than other wallets I have owned which held fewer cards. The quality is very nice. Much more than you would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom as a gift, she's gotten so much use out of it. And surprisingly, she gets a lot of compliments on it, too lol
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality; Efficiently Designed Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Quite impressed with this efficient, well-designed card holder/wallet. The purple color is exactly as shown on the website and the leather is very nice. It appears to be sturdily put together. the credit card pockets are exactly the right size, so there's no slipping or tight, unmanageable fit. The zipper is quality and doesn't appear to be susceptible to sudden failure - something that is important to me. The size is right for all my purses. I'm looking forward to using this for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Creek Woman

customer_reviews.title: Organization, #of card slots
customer_reviews.text: I have rfid purses but sometimes want to switch but need a wallet with more card space. This is perfect, i have never been so organized with every card having its own space. Attractive. It is a little full when closed but better than any wallet put there if you have a large amount of cards, credit, store, ids etc. i love it.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Thin and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I've had so many wallets, and am never happy with any of them. This wallet is thin and light weight, but holds everything. I've been known to use 2 wallets at a time, so it is awesome to only have one. Everyone who sees it wants one. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Features, But Unexpectedly HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, really great craftsmanship, excellent design, but HUGE! The total size of this is literally about 1/3 the size of an 8"x10" sheet of paper. Make sure the size works fir you before ordering. Otherwise, it is a vety high quality item with excellent features. I woul love it if it was 1/2 the size.
customer_reviews.author: LadyScholar

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything!  Grab and go, or tuck in a purse!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet! It holds every card+ cash+ change and business cards in the zipper pocket. I can fit it in a small clutch purse, or just grab and go without a purse. Reasonably priced. Beautiful colors. Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Teri N

customer_reviews.title: everyone keeps asking where I got this!
customer_reviews.text: slim design for holding lots of cards.... I have a ridiculous amount of cards due to my job but this easy snap wallet with 2 pockets does the job no wallet could do! looks decent in my nice purse too. I got black with gold to match and people are always asking where I got this wallet! I love that there are 2 sides and 2 pockets so I am able to separate personal vs business. zippered pocket is great!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I picked this because I have so many cards that make my other wallets or phone wallet cases bulge to a point that they won't shut. I don't have that problem with this case. I like to have a small wallet to fit in my apron pocket at work. This is a little longer than I expected, but it works just fine. I picked the purple so I could easily see it when I do use it in my purse. I also like the fact that it has a pocket for cash and another zippered pocket for loose change.
customer_reviews.author: Linkochan Wright

customer_reviews.title: This is THE ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a slim card case that will hold a few pictures, health and insurance cards, 12 credit cards at least, folded money, etc and this is it! Its still almost totally flat! High quality pebbled leather; smooth zipper, stitching is even and tightly sewn. Looks good for the long haul...I have high hopes for this one! Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stlgal

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: This product is true to its description, good leather, good design, lots of room and good protection. However, I am a little concerned with having all credit cards, memberships and ID cards in one place. It is convenient, but if lost, lots of losses. Each customer has to make a decision in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique M. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet/card organizer came extremely fast! The packaging was really nice- very classy. The leather is really soft, not cheap or vinyl feeling like a lot of other wallets. In all honesty, I really didn't expect it to be so nice. I was pleasantly surprised! I had just treated myself to a high end purse and this wallet matched both in color and quality. Keep up the good work YALUXE! I went to look for an additional product on Amazon today and I was so happy with the quality of this product that I searched the name "Yaluxe" first to see if they made what I was looking for. 5 stars all day long! : )
customer_reviews.author: B  Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything and it’s lighter!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I can get every card and my phone in it. It’s much lighter than the last one I had. The only thing I would change is putting a zipper or some kind of flap in the open side to hold your cash more securely. But I’d buy another without that change.
customer_reviews.author: LLK

customer_reviews.title: and looks great! This has been one of my favorite purchases ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and am so thankful every time I see it!! I remember having more expensive coach, kate spade ect as well as other generic ones trying to find one that would hold all my cards so easily- this not only does that, but made well, and looks great! This has been one of my favorite purchases from Amazon . < 3
customer_reviews.author: Liz Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great wristlet, be sure to measure your device. Not wide enough for most phone cases.
customer_reviews.text: great quality leather. good for most phones, not all. My note 8 will not fit (it is the largest phone on the market though, so keep that in mind). Smaller phones the same size as the wallet will only fit in the side that does not zip. You need a half inch wiggle room to be able to put your phone in the zippered side, so keep that in mind when measuring. This wallets leather quality is great though & virtually indestructable. I'm giving 5 stars because the size issue was my negligence.... measure your mobile device!
customer_reviews.author: BohemianNomad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful wallet. I have received several compliments the very first day I used it. As a matter of fact, cashiers have asked where I purchased this wallet. It is great for organizing all of my cards with additional areas for bills and coins. My only concern is that the snap is pretty tight so I wonder how long it will hold up without splitting. The snap will probably get a little loose over time.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mrtinez

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it but didn’t order the right color.
customer_reviews.text: Wife said she loves it to keep all her stuff in seems to be really happy with it. She’s 27 and loves fashion I didn’t hear her say anything bad other than it’s big, but that isn’t really a complaint right guys?
customer_reviews.author: lucke3er

customer_reviews.title: Just OK, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's a tad longer than expected but otherwise it works as described for my wife. Neatly organizes all of her cards which is what she was looking for. We have not tested the RFID blocking but that's a useful feature these days. Leather seems OK, zipper is not real smooth. Her note 8 phone doesn't fit but she did not expect it to based on the item description.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality - User friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's slim and it fits nicely inside my purse. I also like that there are plenty of slots for cards and it saves me time in that with one quick scan I find the card I need.... versus sorting through a stack of them in my previous wallet. I like that it has the added safety feature shield. The zippered portion is nice... I keep cash in there... and store coupons in the other pocket. It is well made... nice leather.
customer_reviews.author: Janiebugg

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This has held up extremely well and I use it every day. It would make an excellent gift. I’m constantly getting compliments and telling everyone to check it out on Amazon. The color is beautiful and looks better than in the pictures. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: For the love of crafts

customer_reviews.title: The leather feels like a nice quality
customer_reviews.text: What an improvement over my old wallet. It is so slim even with most of the card slots filled. I did find that if I put my change in the zippered compartment that it was difficult to snap it shut. The leather feels like a nice quality. It is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: 3dranchowner

customer_reviews.title: Wallet
customer_reviews.text: It's my 3rd one I love the fact that all my cards fit without the wallet being bulky and I can see them right away.
customer_reviews.author: IRENA HOLMES

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very upset with the quality of this product. The zipper broke within a couple of weeks of light use. I would not recommend this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet design!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet it has been a game changer. Always have had zip wallets. I really like the design of this one. Everything is so easy to get out and put back. The material is sturdy and seems it will last awhile. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Leeah Glenn

customer_reviews.title: This puts a stop to it confusion.
customer_reviews.text: It is everything I was looking for. From the design to the organization. I didn’t think I would find anything this close to perfection for day to day use. Can’t say nothing bad sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Freethinker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but very long.
customer_reviews.text: It is made well and hold a lot of cards plus money area and coin purse too. I like it a lot, but it is a very long wallet and is sometimes cumbersome to get in and out of my purse. I think next time, I will go back to a smaller one and just have rarely used cards in a separate folder.
customer_reviews.author: IceyS

customer_reviews.title: Nice, slim wallet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet because I can see all of my cards at one time and I like how slim it is when closed. However, I have concerns about how long the snap will hold up when the wallet is full. It’s already pulling a little bit. Overall, I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: CanonFan

product_meta.title: YALUXE Wallet for Women RFID Blocking Genuine Leather Multi Card Organizer with Zipper Pocket
feature_bullets: Time to slim your wallet and streamlined your "stuff"! This wallet is definitely slim yet functional for everyday!

SAFETY. PRIVACY. SECURITY. - This Wallet in this color is equipped with advanced unique military grade proprietary blocking material, which blocks RFID signals and protects the valuable private information stored on RFID chips from unauthorized scans. Tested & Approved by Independent Test Lab. Tested from 10MHz to 3000MHz, including 13.56 MHz in which the credit cards operate.
Made from Cowhide Leather with coating finish, luxury looking and durable. Shiny gold-color hardware,heavy duty zipper and detailed streamlined stitching brightens up the wallet.
20 card slots,an open pocket and a zippered compartment for bill/cash/change/a small cellphone,like iPhone6 / Samsung Galaxy S6.
Clear layout and bi-fold design is made for you to keep your things oraganized well and easy to use.
Dimensions:7.48"L x 3.93"H x 0.7".(fit up to IPHONE6.)
